DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate analgesic effect transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation High ( 100 Hz ) low ( 4 Hz ) frequency postpartum pain cesarean section .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Modulation TENS Pain After Cesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: Mothers randomly divide three group ( G100 , G4 placebo ( GP ) - appliance ) evaluate NRS ( numeric rating scale ) , immediately application TENS , every 20 minute one hour application electroanalgesia , verify effectiveness time .
